title: Safety and security of humanitarian personnel and protection of United Nations personnel
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.20
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
25 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-19374 (E)    021225     
*2519374* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 72 (a) 
Strengthening of the coordination of humanitarian and 
disaster relief assistance of the United Nations, including 
special economic assistance: strengthening of the coordination 
of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations 
 
 
 
 
 
Russian Federation:* amendment to draft resolution A/80/L.18  
 
 
 
 Safety and security of humanitarian personnel and protection of 
United Nations personnel 
 
 
 
Delete operative paragraph 9. 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting.
